info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 21 at 12:52PM EDT until July 21 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BERGEN...SOUTHERN WESTCHESTER...BRONX AND NEW YORK (MANHATTAN) COUNTIES... At 1252 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Rutherford, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. This severe storm will be near... Hackensack and Paramus around 105 PM EDT. Ridgefield around 110 PM EDT. Oradell around 115 PM EDT. Bergenfield and Fort Lee around 120 PM EDT. Yonkers and Riverdale around 130 PM EDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
